verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> about בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> unto his sons וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> Gather yourselves together וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> that I may tell לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יִקְרָ֥א <WH7122> you [that] which shall befall אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> you in the last הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

הִקָּבְצ֥וּ <WH6908> Gather yourselves together וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and hear בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> ye sons יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> unto Israel אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> your father

רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> Reuben בְּכֹ֣רִי <WH1060> thou [art] my firstborn אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you כֹּחִ֖י <WH3581> my might וְרֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> and the beginning אוֹנִ֑י <WH202> of my strength יֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> the excellency שְׂאֵ֖ת <WH7613> of dignity וְיֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> and the excellency עָֽז׃ <WH5794> of power

פַּ֤חַז <WH6349> Unstable כַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> as water אַל־ <WH408> shall not תּוֹתַ֔ר <WH3498> thou shalt not excel כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because עָלִ֖יתָ <WH5927> because thou wentest up מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <WH4904> bed אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> to thy father's אָ֥ז <WH227> Then חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <WH2490> then defiledst thou יְצוּעִ֥י <WH3326> to my couch עָלָֽה׃ <WH5927> [it] he went up פ
שִׁמְע֥וֹן <WH8095> Simeon וְלֵוִ֖י <WH3878> and Levi אַחִ֑ים <WH251> [are] brethren כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> instruments חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> of cruelty מְכֵרֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4380> [are in] their habitations

בְּסֹדָם֙ <WH5475> not thou into their secret אַל־ <WH408> nay תָּבֹ֣א <WH935> come נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> O my soul בִּקְהָלָ֖ם <WH6951> unto their assembly אַל־ <WH408> nay תֵּחַ֣ד <WH3161> be not thou united כְּבֹדִ֑י <WH3519> mine honour כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because בְאַפָּם֙ <WH639> for in their anger הָ֣רְגוּ <WH2026> they slew אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> a man וּבִרְצֹנָ֖ם <WH7522> and in their selfwill עִקְּרוּ־ <WH6131> they digged down שֽׁוֹר׃ <WH7794> a wall

אָר֤וּר <WH779> Cursed אַפָּם֙ <WH639> [be] their anger כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָ֔ז <WH5794> for [it was] fierce וְעֶבְרָתָ֖ם <WH5678> and their wrath כִּ֣י <WH3588> for קָשָׁ֑תָה <WH7185> for it was cruel אֲחַלְּקֵ֣ם <WH2505> I will divide בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> them in Jacob וַאֲפִיצֵ֖ם <WH6327> and scatter בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> them in Israel ס

יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> shall praise אַחֶ֔יךָ <WH251> thou [art he] whom thy brethren יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> thy hand בְּעֹ֣רֶף <WH6203> [shall be] in the neck אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> of thine enemies יִשְׁתַּחֲוּ֥וּ <WH7812> shall bow down לְךָ֖ בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> children אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thy father's

גּ֤וּר <WH1482> whelp אַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> [is] a lion's יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah מִטֶּ֖רֶף <WH2964> from the prey בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> my son עָלִ֑יתָ <WH5927> thou art gone up כָּרַ֨ע <WH3766> he stooped down רָבַ֧ץ <WH7257> he couched כְּאַרְיֵ֛ה <WH738> as a lion וּכְלָבִ֖יא <WH3833> and as an old lion מִ֥י <WH4310> who יְקִימֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6965> who shall rouse him up

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָס֥וּר <WH5493> shall not depart שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <WH7626> The sceptre מִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> from Judah וּמְחֹקֵ֖ק <WH2710> nor a lawgiver מִבֵּ֣ין <WH996> between רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> from between his feet עַ֚ד <WH5704> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> until יָבֹ֣א <WH935> come [שִׁילֹה כ] (שִׁילֹ֔ו <WH7886> Shiloh ק) וְל֖וֹ יִקְּהַ֥ת <WH3349> and unto him [shall] the gathering עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of the people

אֹסְרִ֤י <WH631> Binding לַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> unto the vine [עִירֹה כ] (עִירֹ֔ו <WH5895> colt ק) וְלַשֹּׂרֵקָ֖ה <WH8321> unto the choice vine בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> colt אֲתֹנ֑וֹ <WH860> and his ass's כִּבֵּ֤ס <WH3526> he washed בַּיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> in wine לְבֻשׁ֔וֹ <WH3830> his garments וּבְדַם־ <WH1818> in the blood עֲנָבִ֖ים <WH6025> of grapes [סוּתֹה כ] (סוּתֹֽו׃ <WH5497> clothes ק)
חַכְלִילִ֥י <WH2447> [shall be] red עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> His eyes מִיָּ֑יִן <WH3196> with wine וּלְבֶן־ <WH3836> white שִׁנַּ֖יִם <WH8127> and his teeth מֵחָלָֽב׃ <WH2461> with milk פ

זְבוּלֻ֕ן <WH2074> Zebulun לְח֥וֹף <WH2348> at the haven יַמִּ֖ים <WH3220> of the sea יִשְׁכֹּ֑ן <WH7931> shall dwell וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לְח֣וֹף <WH2348> and he [shall be] for an haven אֳנִיּ֔וֹת <WH591> of ships וְיַרְכָת֖וֹ <WH3411> and his border עַל־ <WH5921> toward צִידֹֽן׃ <WH6721> [shall be] unto Zidon ס
יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> Issachar חֲמֹ֣ר <WH2543> ass גָּ֑רֶם <WH1634> [is] a strong רֹבֵ֖ץ <WH7257> couching down בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הַֽמִּשְׁפְּתָֽיִם׃ <WH4942> between two burdens

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> And he saw מְנֻחָה֙ <WH4496> that rest כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [was] good וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נָעֵ֑מָה <WH5276> that [it was] pleasant וַיֵּ֤ט <WH5186> and bowed שִׁכְמוֹ֙ <WH7926> his shoulder לִסְבֹּ֔ל <WH5445> to bear וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> and became לְמַס־ <WH4522> unto tribute עֹבֵֽד׃ <WH5647> and became a servant ס
דָּ֖ן <WH1835> Dan יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> shall judge עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people כְּאַחַ֖ד <WH259> as one שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

יְהִי־ <WH1961> become דָן֙ <WH1835> Dan נָחָ֣שׁ <WH5175> shall be a serpent עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> in דֶ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שְׁפִיפֹ֖ן <WH8207> an adder עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> in אֹ֑רַח <WH734> in the path הַנֹּשֵׁךְ֙ <WH5391> that biteth עִקְּבֵי־ <WH6119> heels ס֔וּס <WH5483> the horse וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> shall fall רֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> so that his rider אָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> backward
לִֽישׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <WH3444> thy salvation קִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6960> I have waited for יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD
גָּ֖ד <WH1410> Gad גְּד֣וּד <WH1416> a troop יְגוּדֶ֑נּוּ <WH1464> shall overcome וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he יָגֻ֥ד <WH1464> him but he shall overcome עָקֵֽב׃ <WH6119> at the last ס

מֵאָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> Out of Asher שְׁמֵנָ֣ה <WH8082> [shall be] fat לַחְמ֑וֹ <WH3899> his bread וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and he shall yield מַֽעֲדַנֵּי־ <WH4574> dainties מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> royal ס
נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> Naphtali אַיָּלָ֣ה <WH355> [is] a hind שְׁלֻחָ֑ה <WH7971> let loose הַנֹּתֵ֖ן <WH5414> he giveth אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> words שָֽׁפֶר׃ <WH8233> goodly ס

בֵּ֤ן <WH1121> bough פֹּרָת֙ <WH6509> [is] a fruitful יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> bough פֹּרָ֖ת <WH6509> [even] a fruitful עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> over עָ֑יִן <WH5869> by a well בָּנ֕וֹת <WH1323> [whose] branches צָעֲדָ֖ה <WH6805> run עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> over שֽׁוּר׃ <WH7791> over the wall
וַֽיְמָרֲרֻ֖הוּ <WH4843> have sorely grieved him וָרֹ֑בּוּ <WH7232> and shot וַֽיִּשְׂטְמֻ֖הוּ <WH7852> [at him] and hated him בַּעֲלֵ֥י <WH1167> archer חִצִּֽים׃ <WH2671> archer

וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> abode בְּאֵיתָן֙ <WH386> in strength קַשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH7198> But his bow וַיָּפֹ֖זּוּ <WH6339> were made strong זְרֹעֵ֣י <WH2220> and the arms יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> of his hands מִידֵי֙ <WH3027> by the hands אֲבִ֣יר <WH46> of the mighty יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> [God] of Jacob מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there רֹעֶ֖ה <WH7462> (from thence [is] the shepherd אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> the stone יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

מֵאֵ֨ל <WH410> [Even] by the God אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְיַעְזְרֶ֗ךָּ <WH5826> who shall help וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> the Almighty וִיבָ֣רְכֶ֔ךָּ <WH1288> who shall bless בִּרְכֹ֤ת <WH1293> thee with blessings שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven מֵעָ֔ל <WH5921> and בִּרְכֹ֥ת <WH1293> blessings תְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> of the deep רֹבֶ֣צֶת <WH7257> that lieth תָּ֑חַת <WH8478> beneath בִּרְכֹ֥ת <WH1293> under blessings שָׁדַ֖יִם <WH7699> of the breasts וָרָֽחַם׃ <WH7356> and of the womb

בִּרְכֹ֣ת <WH1293> The blessings אָבִ֗יךָ <WH1> of thy father גָּֽבְרוּ֙ <WH1396> have prevailed עַל־ <WH5921> and בִּרְכֹ֣ת <WH1293> above the blessings הוֹרַ֔י <WH2029> of my progenitors עַֽד־ <WH5704> Up תַּאֲוַ֖ת <WH8379> unto the utmost bound גִּבְעֹ֣ת <WH1389> hills עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> of the everlasting תִּֽהְיֶ֙ין֙ <WH1961> may they be on לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> they shall be on the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <WH6936> and on the crown of the head נְזִ֥יר <WH5139> of him that was separate אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> from his brethren פ

בִּנְיָמִין֙ <WH1144> Benjamin זְאֵ֣ב <WH2061> [as] a wolf יִטְרָ֔ף <WH2963> shall ravin בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> in the morning יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> he shall devour עַ֑ד <WH5706> the prey וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> and at night יְחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> he shall divide שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> the spoil

כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> ten וְ֠זֹאת <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> them every דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake לָהֶ֤ם אֲבִיהֶם֙ <WH1> and this [is it] that their father וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> unto them and blessed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אִ֛ישׁ <WH582> another אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is what כְּבִרְכָת֖וֹ <WH1293> according to his blessing בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> he blessed אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> And he charged אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> them and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am נֶאֱסָ֣ף <WH622> unto them I am to be gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> unto my people קִבְר֥וּ <WH6912> bury אֹתִ֖י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲבֹתָ֑י <WH1> me with my fathers אֶל־ <WH413> in הַ֨מְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> in the cave אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בִּשְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> that [is] in the field עֶפְר֥וֹן <WH6085> of Ephron הַֽחִתִּֽי׃ <WH2850> the Hittite

בַּמְּעָרָ֞ה <WH4631> In the cave אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בִּשְׂדֵ֧ה <WH7704> that [is] in the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֛ה <WH4375> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> which [is] before מַמְרֵ֖א <WH4471> Mamre בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which קָנָ֨ה <WH7069> bought אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> which Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> with the field מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> עֶפְרֹ֥ן <WH6085> of Ephron הַחִתִּ֖י <WH2850> the Hittite לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <WH272> for a possession קָֽבֶר׃ <WH6913> of a buryingplace

שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> There קָֽבְר֞וּ <WH6912> There they buried אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> Abraham וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> and Sarah אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife שָׁ֚מָּה <WH8033> there קָבְר֣וּ <WH6912> there they buried אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> Isaac וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> רִבְקָ֣ה <WH7259> and Rebekah אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> his wife וְשָׁ֥מָּה <WH8033> and there קָבַ֖רְתִּי <WH6912> and there I buried אֶת־ <WH853> לֵאָֽה׃ <WH3812> Leah

מִקְנֵ֧ה <WH4735> The purchase הַשָּׂדֶ֛ה <WH7704> of the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֥ה <WH4631> and of the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֖וֹ מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> that [is] therein [was] from the children חֵֽת׃ <WH2845> of Heth

וַיְכַ֤ל <WH3615> had made an end יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And when Jacob לְצַוֹּ֣ת <WH6680> of commanding אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> his sons וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> he gathered up רַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> his feet אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמִּטָּ֑ה <WH4296> into the bed וַיִּגְוַ֖ע <WH1478> and yielded up the ghost וַיֵּאָ֥סֶף <WH622> and was gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> unto his people
